usa: The Emergency Quota Act was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-90" class="reference">[90]</sup>
The Tulsa Race riot occurred; resulting in the deaths of up to 300 African-Americans and leaving more than 8,000 homeless.<sup id="cite_ref-91" class="reference">[91]</sup>
The first meeting of the Washington Disarmament Conference of 1921 was held.[92]
